video-caption: What better way to start my birthday than with a little Werner Herzog? As Mark Kermode pointed out, it takes Herzog to go to Antarctica, gaze upon the vast, natural wilderness, and then focus immediately on suicidal penguins. “With 5,000 kms ahead of him, he’s heading towards certain death”.
